name: Steambots
description:
The Steambots are trying to escape a factory, but you need to save them all as each robot has their own unique ability! One can jump, one can power things with steam and one can shrink down!

Made in a week for the Game Jobs Live Spring Game Jam 2022!

Theme: Every life counts

Developers:

Kian Bennett - Programmer

Harley Driver - Designer

Emily Everett - Character & Environment artist

Elliot Jermy - Programmer & Designer

Vic Primmer - Character & Environment artist

Ethan Traylor - Designer
